Description.Text:
Property Location
Appart'City Nice Acropolis is centrally located in Nice, walking distance from Jean Bouin Sport Palace and close to Nice Acropolis Convention and Exhibition Center. This family-friendly residence is within close proximity of Place Arson and La Tete au Carre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 129 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and microwaves.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 129 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and microwaves.

Appart'City Nice Acropolis is centrally located in Nice, walking distance from Jean Bouin Sport Palace and close to Nice Acropolis Convention and Exhibition Center. This family-friendly residence is within close proximity of Place Arson and La Tete au Carre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Jean Bouin Sport Palace - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Nice Acropolis Convention and Exhibition Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Place Arson - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
La Tete au Carre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Place Garibaldi - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
St. Roch Hospital - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Marc Chagall National Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Nice Theatre - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Franciscan Museum - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Cimiez Amphitheater - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Matisse Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Pasteur Hospital - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Place Rossetti - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Universite de Nice - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur) - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Monte Carlo (MCM-Monaco Heliport) - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi

The preferred airport for Appart'City Nice Acropolis is Nice (NCE-Cote d'Azur).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: "Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated”. Reception opening hours are: Mon-Fri: 08h00-12h00 and 15h00-20h00 all year Sat: 08h00-12h00 and 14h00-17h00 all year Sunday and bank holiday: closed
